mapper.sql: A.AP_NO, A.DOMAIN, A.CO_VAT_NO, A.PO_NO, A.LEASE_NO, A.AP_DATE, A.PRINT_DATE, A.STATUS, A.CR_USER, A.CR_TIME, A.MD_USER, A.MD_TIME, A.SUBPOENA_DATE, A.SUBPOENA_NBR, A.APP_DATE, A.APP_USER, round(sum(F.TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT), 0) TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT, round(sum(F.BUSINESS_TAX), 0) BUSINESS_TAX, round(sum(F.TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT) + sum(F.BUSINESS_TAX), 0) AP_AMT, B.NAME DOMAIN_NAME, C.CO_NAME, isnull(D.CHN_NM, A.APP_USER) APP_USER_NAME, isnull(E.LOOKUP_CODE_DESC, A.STATUS) STATUS_DSCR, G.PO_NAME, case when (select count(1) from TB_PAY_PAYMENT_REQUEST_VOUCHER X, TB_PAY_VOUCHER_CREDIT Y where X.SEQ_NBR = Y.MST_SEQ_NBR and X.PROCESS_TYPE = 'OSA' and Y.CASH_REQ_AP_NO = A.PO_NO) > 0 then '是' else '否' end CERTIFICATE_FLAG
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE A left join TB_ORG_DOMAIN B on B.ID = A.DOMAIN left join TB_COM_COMPANY C on C.CO_VAT_NO = A.CO_VAT_NO left join TB_AUTH_PERSONNEL D on D.PSN_NO = A.APP_USER left join TB_PAY_LOOKUP_CODE E on E.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'OSA_STATUS' and E.LOOKUP_CODE = A.STATUS left join TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE_DTL F on F.MST_AP_NO = A.AP_NO left join TB_COM_PO_MAIN G on G.PO_NO = A.PO_NO
group by A.AP_NO, A.DOMAIN, A.CO_VAT_NO, A.PO_NO, A.LEASE_NO, A.AP_DATE, A.PRINT_DATE, A.STATUS, A.CR_USER, A.CR_TIME, A.MD_USER, A.MD_TIME, A.SUBPOENA_DATE, A.SUBPOENA_NBR, A.APP_DATE, A.APP_USER, B.NAME, C.CO_NAME, isnull(D.CHN_NM, A.APP_USER), isnull(E.LOOKUP_CODE_DESC, A.STATUS), G.PO_NAME
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE A left join TB_ORG_DOMAIN B on B.ID = A.DOMAIN left join TB_COM_COMPANY C on C.CO_VAT_NO = A.CO_VAT_NO left join TB_AUTH_PERSONNEL D on D.PSN_NO = A.APP_USER left join TB_PAY_LOOKUP_CODE E on E.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'OSA_STATUS' and E.LOOKUP_CODE = A.STATUS left join TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE_DTL F on F.MST_AP_NO = A.AP_NO left join TB_COM_PO_MAIN G on G.PO_NO = A.PO_NO where A.AP_NO = #{AP_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by A.AP_NO, A.DOMAIN, A.CO_VAT_NO, A.PO_NO, A.LEASE_NO, A.AP_DATE, A.PRINT_DATE, A.STATUS, A.CR_USER, A.CR_TIME, A.MD_USER, A.MD_TIME, A.SUBPOENA_DATE, A.SUBPOENA_NBR, A.APP_DATE, A.APP_USER, B.NAME, C.CO_NAME, isnull(D.CHN_NM, A.APP_USER), isnull(E.LOOKUP_CODE_DESC, A.STATUS), G.PO_NAME
mapper.insert: insert into TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE (AP_NO, DOMAIN, CO_VAT_NO, PO_NO, LEASE_NO, AP_DATE, PRINT_DATE, STATUS, CR_USER, CR_TIME, MD_USER, MD_TIME, SUBPOENA_DATE, SUBPOENA_NBR, APP_DATE, APP_USER) values (#{AP_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CO_VAT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PO_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LEASE_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{PRINT_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{STATUS,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{SUBPOENA_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{SUBPOENA_NBR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{APP_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE
AP_NO = #{record.AP_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOMAIN = #{record.DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_VAT_NO = #{record.CO_VAT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PO_NO = #{record.PO_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEASE_NO = #{record.LEASE_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AP_DATE = #{record.AP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRINT_DATE = #{record.PRINT_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{record.STATUS,jdbcType=CHAR},
CR_USER = #{record.CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CR_TIME = #{record.CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MD_USER = #{record.MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MD_TIME = #{record.MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUBPOENA_DATE = #{record.SUBPOENA_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUBPOENA_NBR = #{record.SUBPOENA_NBR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_DATE = #{record.APP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APP_USER = #{record.APP_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE set AP_NO = #{record.AP_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMAIN = #{record.DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CO_VAT_NO = #{record.CO_VAT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PO_NO = #{record.PO_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEASE_NO = #{record.LEASE_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AP_DATE = #{record.AP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRINT_DATE = #{record.PRINT_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{record.STATUS,jdbcType=CHAR}, CR_USER = #{record.CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_TIME = #{record.CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MD_USER = #{record.MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MD_TIME = #{record.MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUBPOENA_DATE = #{record.SUBPOENA_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUBPOENA_NBR = #{record.SUBPOENA_NBR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_DATE = #{record.APP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APP_USER = #{record.APP_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE
DOMAIN = #{DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_VAT_NO = #{CO_VAT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PO_NO = #{PO_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEASE_NO = #{LEASE_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AP_DATE = #{AP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRINT_DATE = #{PRINT_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{STATUS,jdbcType=CHAR},
CR_USER = #{CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CR_TIME = #{CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MD_USER = #{MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MD_TIME = #{MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUBPOENA_DATE = #{SUBPOENA_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUBPOENA_NBR = #{SUBPOENA_NBR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_DATE = #{APP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APP_USER = #{APP_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where AP_NO = #{AP_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE set DOMAIN = #{DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CO_VAT_NO = #{CO_VAT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PO_NO = #{PO_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEASE_NO = #{LEASE_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AP_DATE = #{AP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRINT_DATE = #{PRINT_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{STATUS,jdbcType=CHAR}, CR_USER = #{CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_TIME = #{CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MD_USER = #{MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MD_TIME = #{MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUBPOENA_DATE = #{SUBPOENA_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUBPOENA_NBR = #{SUBPOENA_NBR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_DATE = #{APP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APP_USER = #{APP_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where AP_NO = #{AP_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
